Kurasu's RL breeding
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): Kurasu's RL breeding
By Salazen on Tuesday, October 17, 2000 - 10:51 pm:

Well, it looks like Kurasu's trial in RL breeding is a success.

She managed to blend a RPG-freak with a slightly twisted fellow with similar tastes. The results are finally in.

Size: large -- 21 inches
Weight: large -- 10 lbs
personality: dunno -- mostly sleeping so far.
Likes: squirming
Dislikes: coming out. (It was only 2 weeks late)

Attacks:
Cry:
A sonic attack that harms males and attracts females into range for his other attack.

Cuteness:
A simple attack designed to steal the will of any female attracted by his cry. Most males are immune. They somehow see the little brat for what it is when it attempts to use cuteness.

Dirty Diaper

Congratulations and good luck.

By Kurasu Soratobu on Wednesday, October 18, 2000 - 03:37 pm:

Well, what with the huge baby boom at the local hospital, I ended up getting sent home early... so I have returned!

The little(?!) fellow's name is Cameron Michael. He's doing really well at last check, and already well on the way to mastering that Dirty Diaper attack you're talking about. Plus, I've heard he's trying to learn a Super Cry that can rival Tiger's 'Roar'. Guess it's a move chained off 'Cry', since he's been practicing it so much.

Anyhow, thanks for all the congratulations! I'm liable to be a few days behind while I catch up on sleep and stuff. I'll make sure to have Monster Rancher well on hand!
